languages.text: "Деточка, береги себя. И {rt_mf|Его|Ее} Светлишеству передай от меня благодарность большущую, вовек не забуду!"
"Stay safe, dearest. And say a great big thank you to {rt_mf|His|Her} Graciousness for me! I'll never forget {rt_mf|his|her} good heart!"
languages.original_text: "Деточка, береги себя. И {rt_mf|Его|Ее} Светлишеству передай от меня благодарность большущую, вовек не забуду!"

traits.locale_text: "Stay safe, sweetie. And say a great big thank you to {mf|His|Her} Celacial Highness for me! I'll never forget!"
"Stay safe, sweetie. And say a great big thank you to {mf|His|Her} Celacial Highness for me! I'll never forget!"
"Stay safe, sweetie. And say a great big thank you to {mf|His|Her} Celacial Highness for me! I'll never forget!"
"Stay safe, sweetie. And say a great big thank you to {mf|His|Her} Celacial Highness for me! I'll never forget!"
"Stay safe, dearest. And say a great big thank you to {rt_mf|His|Her} Graciousness for me! I'll never forget {rt_mf|his|her} good heart!"
"Stay safe, dearest. And say a great big thank you to {rt_mf|His|Her} Graciousness for me! I'll never forget {rt_mf|his|her} good heart!"

languages.text: 「どうかご無事で、親愛なるお方。それと、慈悲深きお方に心からのお礼を言っておいて！あの方の優しいお心を、決して忘れないわ！」
languages.original_text: "Stay safe, dearest. And say a great big thank you to {rt_mf|His|Her} Graciousness for me! I'll never forget {rt_mf|his|her} good heart!"

traits.locale_text: 「どうかご無事で、親愛なるお方。それと、慈悲深きお方に心からのお礼を言っておいて！あの方の優しいお心を、決して忘れないわ！」

languages.text: "Sağlıcakla kal kıymetlim. {mf|Beyime|Hanımıma} şükranlarımı ilet! O güzel kalbi, hatırımdan asla çıkmayacak!"
languages.original_text: "Stay safe, dearest. And say a great big thank you to {rt_mf|His|Her} Graciousness for me! I'll never forget {rt_mf|his|her} good heart!"

traits.locale_text: "Sağlıcakla kal kıymetlim. {mf|Beyime|Hanımıma} şükranlarımı ilet! O güzel kalbi hatırımdan asla çıkmayacak!"

languages.text: «Cuídate, amor mío. ¡Y dale las gracias a Su Excelencia de mi parte! ¡Nunca olvidaré su bondad!».
languages.original_text: "Stay safe, dearest. And say a great big thank you to {rt_mf|His|Her} Graciousness for me! I'll never forget {rt_mf|his|her} good heart!"

traits.locale_text: «Cuídate, amor mío. ¡Y dale las gracias a Su Excelencia de mi parte! ¡Nunca olvidaré su bondad!».

languages.text: “要保重，亲爱的！另外，记得替我向那位了不起的大人道谢！我永远都不会忘记{rt_mf|他|她}的仁慈！”
languages.original_text: "Stay safe, dearest. And say a great big thank you to {rt_mf|His|Her} Graciousness for me! I'll never forget {rt_mf|his|her} good heart!"

traits.locale_text: “要保重，亲爱的！另外，记得替我向那位了不起的大人道谢！我永远都不会忘记{rt_mf|他|她}的仁慈！”

languages.text: « Fais attention à toi, mon cœur. Et remercie chaleureusement Sa Gracieuseté de ma part ! Je n'oublierai jamais la bonté qu'{rt_mf|il|elle} m'a témoignée ! »
languages.original_text: "Stay safe, dearest. And say a great big thank you to {rt_mf|His|Her} Graciousness for me! I'll never forget {rt_mf|his|her} good heart!"

traits.locale_text: « Fais attention à toi, mon cœur. Et remercie chaleureusement Sa Gracieuseté de ma part ! Je n'oublierai jamais la bonté qu'{mf|il|elle} m'a témoignée ! »

languages.text: "Pass auf dich auf, meine Liebste. Und richte {rt_mf|Seiner|Ihrer} Großherzigkeit meinen Dank aus! Ich werde {rt_mf|Sein|Ihr} gutes Herz niemals vergessen!"
languages.original_text: "Stay safe, dearest. And say a great big thank you to {rt_mf|His|Her} Graciousness for me! I'll never forget {rt_mf|his|her} good heart!"

traits.locale_text: "Pass auf dich auf, meine Liebste. Und richte {rt_mf|Seiner|Ihrer} Großherzigkeit meinen Dank aus! Ich werde {rt_mf|Sein|Ihr} gutes Herz niemals vergessen!"
